div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 249 Piraeus (Tambouria), 1938 Burial: c. 160-150 B.C. (T) Contents: 49 AE Athens: 8 3rd cent. (as Svoronos pl. 22, 74 ff. [3]; pl. 23, 47-9 [5]) 4 "Delian" types (as Sv. pl. 107, 55 ff.) 1 "Eleusinian" type (as Sv. pl. 103, 50 ff.) 36 New Style (as Sv. pl. 22, 53-8 [1]; pl. 81, 17-8 [7], 28 [8], 30 [2]; 81, 22 [8]; these last best preserved) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1938, p. 447 (no details)
